com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.factory
Class ModifyItemCommandFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.factory.ModifyItemCommandFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.factory.IModifyItemCommandFactory
public final class ModifyItemCommandFactory
extends Object
implements com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.factory.IModifyItemCommandFactory

A factory for creating AddCardToItem, AmendCardOnItem, AmendLink, DeleteCardFromItem, DeleteItem, and SetItemSecurityPermissions commands.

Constructor Summary
ModifyItemCommandFactory()
          Constructs a new ModifyItemCommandFactory.
 
Method Summary
 AddCardToItem createAddCardToItem(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, CardChangeSet cardChangeSet)
          Creates and returns an AddCardToItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.
 AmendCardOnItem createAmendCardOnItem(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, CardChangeSet cardChangeSet)
          Creates and returns an AmendCardOnItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.
 AmendLink createAmendLink(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, LinkDirection linkDirection, String linkStrengthId)
          Creates an AmendLink command for the Link with the specified ItemIdentifier.
 DeleteCardFromItem createDeleteCardFromItem(ItemIdentifier itemId, String cardId)
          Creates and returns a DeleteCardFromItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.
 DeleteItem createDeleteItem(ItemIdentifier itemId)
          Creates and returns a DeleteItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.
 SetItemSecurityPermissions createSetItemSecurityPermissions(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier, Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> accessPermissions, Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> grantPermissions, String securityPermissionsSignpost)
          Creates and returns a SetItemSecurityPermissions command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Method Detail

createAddCardToItem

public AddCardToItem createAddCardToItem(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                                         CardChangeSet cardChangeSet)
Creates and returns an AddCardToItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Parameters:
itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item to which the Card will be added.
cardChangeSet - A CardChangeSet containing information for the new Card, generated using a CardChangeSetFactory.
Returns:
See above.

createAmendCardOnItem

public AmendCardOnItem createAmendCardOnItem(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                                             CardChangeSet cardChangeSet)
Creates and returns an AmendCardOnItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Parameters:
itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item on which the Card will be amended.
cardChangeSet - A CardChangeSet containing information about the Card amendments to perform, generated using a CardChangeSetFactory.
Returns:
See above.

createAmendLink

public AmendLink createAmendLink(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                                 LinkDirection linkDirection,
                                 String linkStrengthId)
Creates an AmendLink command for the Link with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Parameters:
itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Link to amend.
linkDirection - A new LinkDirection value for the amended Link, or null to leave the value unchanged.
linkStrengthId - A String containing the identifier of a new LinkStrength for the amended Link (retrieved from the Schema), or null to leave the link strength unchanged.
Returns:
See above.

createDeleteCardFromItem

public DeleteCardFromItem createDeleteCardFromItem(ItemIdentifier itemId,
                                                   String cardId)
Creates and returns a DeleteCardFromItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Parameters:
itemId - The ItemIdentifier of the Item from which the Card will be deleted.
cardId - A String containing the identifier of the Card to delete.
Returns:
See above.

createDeleteItem

public DeleteItem createDeleteItem(ItemIdentifier itemId)
Creates and returns a DeleteItem command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Parameters:
itemId - The ItemIdentifier of the Item to delete.
Returns:
See above.

createSetItemSecurityPermissions

public SetItemSecurityPermissions createSetItemSecurityPermissions(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                                                                   Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> accessPermissions,
                                                                   Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> grantPermissions,
                                                                   String securityPermissionsSignpost)
Creates and returns a SetItemSecurityPermissions command for the Item with the specified ItemIdentifier.

Parameters:
itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Item whose security permissions are to be set.
accessPermissions - New SecurityAccessPermissions for the Item, or null to leave the access permissions unchanged.
grantPermissions - New SecurityGrantPermissions for the Item, or null to leave the grant permissions unchanged.
securityPermissionsSignpost - A String indicating whom to contact to obtain increased permissions on the Item, or null to leave the signpost unchanged.
Returns:
See above.
